data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea glauca (White spruce) from sample NELSON-32

Slope 0 deg, Geology: Silikat Alluvialschutt, Tree line 1500 m, av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 50%, Shrub cover 60%, Herb cover 80%, Moss cover 100%, Vegatation type: Alt. Best. in feucht. Flusseb. V. Moos überw, Film number: 706A
